title: Welcome to the Pub
overview: The story shows the various life styles of urban diners through the perspective of a tavern owner full of life wisdom. Whenever they encounter stumbling blocks in their struggle and life, they will come to the tavern to sit in the tavern, and under the hospitality of the boss's food and wine, they will be relieved and regain their confidence in life. The tavern hidden in the depths of the alley is like a shelter for people. The stories that happen in it are exactly the life we are experiencing now.
